Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: A perfect little bar for drinks with friends or on your own. First went here 9 years ago and yesterday hunted it out to visit again. …

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: They are lovely!  The attention is very good!  ew a small bar but with good variety of drinks!

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Great bar with great food!  The landlord is very funny and nice!  highly recommend

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Amazing bar! Leo is a wonderful bartender and owner whos always down to talk about really anything. The beer is amazing, prices are absolutely fair and all in all its a place that’s worth coming back for!

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: It's a bar in which you can smoke and watch sports, nothing special

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: A perfect place to grab a pint, catch up with some friends, or even just read a book. The bartender was great to chat with and the environment in there is quaint. They played really great classics and jazz music. This place is one of my go-tos when I go back to Amsterdam.

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Super nice little bar, the owner/bartender is a great guy if you come early enough to chat. Prices are fine, there are snacks, and overall a really excellent experience!

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Amazing bar - went for a couple beers on a Wednesday and Leo was there. Great atmosphere, good prices, funky decorations. If we lived here, we'd be regulars at this bar.

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Really friendly staff, nice little bar!

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: This is the place any bar should be like. Very tasty Heineken and Amstel, good music, nice atmosphere. It's rather small, so if you got more than 6 person, perhaps it won't be very comfortable. Surely visit it again next time I'll be at Amst!

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: A great little bar! I love this place. Little safes to store your alcohol in for when your re-visit. Great atmosphere with a welcoming smile. A must visit. Plus a bowl of sweets on the bar.

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Pay for water!? Madness. No wi-fi. Rude staff (Sunday 26th of Feb 2017) Rudest bar man / service industry worker in my whole one week experience in Amsterdam. You should be ashamed. …

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Leo is an absolute gentleman, the bar is welcoming and totally worth visiting. We had a fantastic time.

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: We came from germany and had a nice stay in this bar. Thanks to the barkeeper for the nice evenings and the Infos !

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Ignore the previous review. Water is free, staff is friendly and the place has a great atmosphere. The only issue: limited seats

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Nice staff, good beer,little bit expensive 6:20 euro per pint

Name: Lange Leo
Review Text: Nice place to drink beer
